response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and desires, is worth $1,200,000 to you. After careful consideration and negotiation, I am pleased to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents an exceptional value, allowing you to secure this remarkable item at a significant discount compared to its true worth. I am confident that this investment will not only fulfill your aspirations but also provide substantial returns over time. Should you choose to accept this offer, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction promptly. If you have any questions or need further information, feel free to reach out to me at your convenience. I look forward to the possibility of working together on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 950000}
